tasks.clean_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to Clean? This will delete database information and generated content for all scenes and galleries that are no longer found in the filesystem.
tasks.dry_mode_selected: Dry Mode selected. No actual deleting will take place, only logging.
tasks.import_warning: Are you sure you want to import? This will delete the database and re-import from your exported metadata.

scene_data_updated_notification: Scene data has been updated, click here to refresh
tag_weight_help: Weight for similarity calculation (0.0 = least important, 1.0 = most important, default: 0.5)

color_preset.tag_requirements_description_help: This description will be shown as a hint when tagging scenes
color_preset.required_for_requirements_help: When checked, this preset must be filled to satisfy requirements. When unchecked, it's optional.
color_preset.drag_to_reorder: Drag and drop to reorder presets

tag_requirements.title: Tag Requirements

dialogs.clear_o_history_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the O history?
dialogs.clear_omg_history_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the OMG history?
dialogs.clear_play_history_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the play history?

reduce_resolution.title: Reduce Video Resolution
reduce_resolution.select_required: Please select a file and target resolution
reduce_resolution.no_options: No smaller resolution options available for this video
reduce_resolution.info: This will reduce the video resolution and create a new MP4 file with the selected resolution. The original file will be replaced.
reduce_resolution.warning: Warning: This operation will permanently modify the video file. Make sure you have a backup if needed.
reduce_resolution.confirm_message: Are you sure you want to reduce the resolution from {currentResolution} to {targetResolution}?

convert_to_mp4.warning: This operation will permanently replace the original video file with an MP4 version. A backup will be created in the temp folder in case of errors.
convert_to_mp4.warning_text: This operation will permanently replace the original video file with an MP4 version. A backup will be created in the temp folder in case of errors.
convert_to_mp4.info: This will convert the video from {originalFormat} to MP4 format and replace the original file. The conversion process may take some time depending on the file size. If an error occurs, check the temp folder for the backup file.
convert_to_mp4.temp_path_label: Backup will be stored in this folder during the operation. If something goes wrong, look for the backup there:

convert_hls_to_mp4.warning: This operation will permanently replace the original HLS video with an MP4 version. A backup will be created in the temp folder in case of errors.
convert_hls_to_mp4.warning_text: This operation will permanently replace the original HLS video with an MP4 version. A backup will be created in the temp folder in case of errors.
convert_hls_to_mp4.info: This will convert the HLS video to MP4 format and replace the original file. The conversion process may take some time depending on the file size. If an error occurs, check the temp folder for the backup file.
convert_hls_to_mp4.temp_path_label: Backup will be stored in this folder during the operation. If something goes wrong, look for the backup there:

trim_video.title: Trim Video
trim_video.select_required: Please enter start time or end time
trim_video.invalid_times: Start time must be less than end time and both must be within video duration
trim_video.info: This will trim the video from the specified start time to end time using fast stream copy (no re-encoding). The original file will be replaced.
trim_video.warning: Warning: This operation will permanently modify the video file. Make sure you have a backup if needed.
trim_video.warning_text: This operation will permanently modify the video file. A backup will be created in the temp folder in case of errors.
trim_video.confirm_message: Are you sure you want to trim the video from {startTime}s to {endTime}s? This will keep the segment from {startTime}s to {endTime}s (duration: {trimDuration}) and remove the first {startTime}s and the last {remainingDuration}s.
trim_video.disabled_message: Video trimming is only available when start_time or end_time are set for this scene.
trim_video.disabled_tooltip: Set start time or end time for this scene to enable video trimming
trim_video.temp_path_label: Backup will be stored in this folder during the operation. If something goes wrong, look for the backup there:

regenerate_sprites.title: Regenerate sprites
regenerate_sprites.warning: This will delete existing sprites and generate new ones for this scene.
regenerate_sprites.confirm_message: Are you sure you want to regenerate sprites for this scene? This will delete existing sprite files and create new ones.
